text:
A competitive examination guidance cell has been inaugurated in the department of management studies, Sri Balaji Chockalingam Engineering College, Arni on Tuesday.

A.M.Kasiviswanathan, former chairman, TNPSC, inaugurated the cell and wanted the students to possess qualities such as positive attitude, smart work and willingness to learn. He also answered questions regarding competitive exams, raised by students. A.C.Ravi, secretary, ACS Group of colleges presided, Principal R.Elangovan, vice principal R.Venkatarathinam and HoD of management studies K. Siva spoke. Kanimozhi, Asst. Professor, proposed vote of thanks.
title: Examination guidance cell inaugurated
